knimeNode.name: Meta Info Extractor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Extracts the meta info key, value pairs of documents.

fullDescription.intro:
Extracts the meta information key, value pairs of documents. For each key a column is created. The column contains the specific values for each document related to that key.
The output table contains the data from the input table as well as key columns containing the values (in case there is meta information stored in the documents).

ports.inPort: The input table which contains the documents.
ports.outPort: The output table which contains documents and the extracted meta information.
